name: Don't! Spill the Beans
description:
Don't! Spill the Beans

A game by FyshStyx - Source Code

Guide

You are Blabbo - the greatest gossiper in the land! Bluford, Ewart, Ferdo and Gorm keep telling you secrets about one another and it's up to you to deal with it! Gain points by correctly matching each serve of hot bean-y goss to the correct character. But be quick! Blabbo can only hold on to so many beans at a time before they go and spill them all! If you have more than 10 cans surrounding Blabbo, or if you match a can to the wrong head, it's game over.

Leave a screenshot of your highest score in the comments below and see if you can become the best bean spiller around!

Controls + Tips
  • Left click to select a can and then left click a head to match with the can
  • Try playing in fullscreen if the bean cans are too small on your monitor
  • If you miss a can, you don't need to guess straight away - you can have up to 10 cans in reserve before you automatically get a game over.
  • You can't click a can until it finishes "growing" (this was mainly done to avoid issues with clicking a can when you meant to click a head)
FAQ Is the game frozen?

The game lags a bit when you click the play button. Give it a few seconds and it should work fine.

How to fix lag?

If the game is running, but the cans are jittering around, try turning the background off from the main menu
